tidyAssayData 0.2.0
  • Reference

    Tidy assay data column names

    transformMatrixCol.Rd

    Before performing differential expression genes analysis on expression data, it is important to ensure that the column names of the assay data is same with sample ID of the clinical or metadata. This function therefore help to transform the assay data column names to suit the sample name in the metadata.

    transformMatrixCol(expMat, Sep, nSep, pos)

    Arguments

    expMat

    A matrix data frame.

    Sep

    The delimiter that joins the appendage to desired column name

    nSep

    The count of the delimiter in the each column name.

    pos

    The position of the desired column name in Assay column name

    Value

    a data frame, with desired column name.

    Details

    Title

    Examples

    transformMatrixCol(Exprdata, Sep = ".", nSep = 2, pos = 2)
#> Error in is.data.frame(expMat): object 'Exprdata' not found
